title: Wout van Aert Trims CX Program with Eye on Classics Boost: ‘A Higher Goal in Mind’
content:
Jumbo-Visma star tapping the 2023-24 cyclocross brakes: 'I don't want to leave anything to chance for the spring classics.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Trims CX Program with Eye on Classics Boost: ‘A Higher Goal in Mind’ on Velo.
author: ahood
